actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, or it begins to turn to stone and is restrained until the end of its next turn, when it must repeat the saving throw. The effect ends if the second save is successful; otherwise the target is petrified for 24 hours.
actions.name: Petrifying Claws

languages: the languages it knew in life
name: Stone Cursed [MoM]

specialTraits.description: The stone cursed has advantage on the attack rolls of opportunity attack.
specialTraits.name: Cunning Opportunist

specialTraits.description: If the stone cursed is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the stone cursed move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the stone cursed isn't a statue.
specialTraits.name: False Appearance

specialTraits.description: The stone cursed doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
